thread.title: Customer clint andrus
thread.title_full: Viking Bags reviewed by Customer clint andrus

author: Customer clint andrus
title: Customer clint andrus
text:
I would like to apologize for my first response I wrote about vikingvbags not refunding me on my purchase. At the time of writing my response it was out of anger and I didn't take time to see Viking bags was willing to work with me. Viking bags actually stepped up and they do stand behind there product and customers.
I will keep buying from Viking bags and I hope everyone else will to.
